ja487:1.2: Dummakkharūpā → dummudharūpā (bj, mr); dummukharūpā (pts-vp-pli1) | mantaṃ jappanti → yeme japanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ye mantaṃ japanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); ye'me jappanti mante (^ja377#3 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:2.1: karetha → karotha (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kareyya (sya1ed, sya2ed); katvāna (^ja377#4 [Setaketujātaka])
ja487:16.3: sajātiṃ pamuñcanti → na tesaṃ jātiṃ pucchanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); na tesaṃ jāti sujjhati (mr)
